welcome_message_body: Welcome to Pontianak, the charming city known for its equatorial monument and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your time exploring our beautiful city and all it has to offer.

restaurants.name: Bakmi kepiting Ou Kie
restaurants.description: Bakmi kepiting Ou Kie is a noodle restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Rumah Makan RIO II
restaurants.description: Rumah Makan RIO II is a food court located in Pontianak.

restaurants.name: Gleam Cafe (chai kue panas 18)
restaurants.description: Gleam Cafe (chai kue panas 18) is a café located in Pontianak.
restaurants.address: Jalan Tamar No. 3 (Jl. Tamar), Pontianak, Kalimantan Barat

restaurants.name: Ce Hun Tiaw Ahui
restaurants.description: Ce Hun Tiaw Ahui is a food truck located in Kecamatan Pontianak Selatan.
restaurants.address: Jl.WR.Supratman (Pontianak), Kecamatan Pontianak Selatan, Kalimantan Barat 78243

restaurants.name: Soto Solo Berseri
restaurants.description: Soto Solo Berseri is a indonesian restaurant located in Pontianak.
restaurants.address: Jl. WR Supratman, Pontianak, Kalimantan Barat
